title: Davidvictorson
author: Davidvictorson
content: In my estimation the best times I discover that I visit online casinos are1) Promotion/BonusesNumerous casinos ran promotions and gave bonuses over the holiday season. I took advantage of it and used the promotions and offers to play my preferred casino game, slot.2) Free timeI utilize my leisure time as well. After completing all of my tasks for the day or week, I simply go to an online casino to play a game, search the site for new and interesting features or games, or read the blog.4) Extra cashEvery time I have a little extra money that I know I can afford to spend, I deposit it into my online casino wallet and play some games. It's been worthwhile thus far. When I stay away from online casinos1) Family/relationship or personal challengeSince we are all human, we face difficulties in life. On days like these, when I feel burdened by my family, my relationships, or a personal difficulty, I avoid playing at online casinos. I do not turn to online casinos as a coping strategy; instead, I address it head-on.2) Unhappy/ Over happyWhen I am overly happy or unhappy, I avoid visiting an online casino. When I am really happy, I might over bet because my emotions might have impaired my judgment. Whenever I'm sad, the same thing applies.3) Working on a ProjectWhen I am working on significant assignments or have a deadline to meet, I try to avoid going to online casinos because I know I can get carried away. And if I lose money, I might have a horrible day, which would affect my efficiency, productivity and output.Do you have a best time when you visit an online casino and when you totally steer clear from them?

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Best time to visit the casino is when you're feeling lucky and you have that extra cash on you. No matter the outcome of your gambling session, you still felt good playing in the casino and you enjoyed your time without having second thoughts about the money that you've spent. I've been like these for the past couple of years thinking that I will get a lucky streak and see a list full of greens, that's why I've been hooked with dice for the longest time. Thankfully I came to my senses and began trying to win rather than just see a lucky streak on my account then accepting defeat afterwards. As for bad times, when you don't have any money then that's a bad time to play in the casino for sure. I'd rather eat my last meal with my last money than try to gamble it away and make myself believe that I can turn it to a win.

comments.author: darkangel11
comments.body: You've placed casino bonus as no. 1, above free time and spare money. Does it mean the first one is the most important of the three? When I saw it it made me smile because in such case it matters to you less if you have enough money to gamble or some free time. What matters is they're offering a bonus and you can't miss out on this opportunity. This really reads like a story from gamblers anonymous  I gamble on big events like the World Cup. It's not about whether I have time as it takes just a few minutes to bet. It also doesn't mater how much money I have because I can do with just $10. Any win makes me happy. I don't do it for big money, rather to feel some excitement and spike up the game.

comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on January 13, 2023, 04:37:40 PMDo you have a best time when you visit an online casino and when you totally steer clear from them?When it comes to the best time to gamble I personally do not have some sort of strategy for this, I just gamble whenever I feel like gambling a little bit of money regardless of the bonuses I may receive, and when it comes to the moments to not gamble this is where I do have some rules, I never gamble if I have drank some alcohol, if I need money for something I want to buy, if I am around other people, if I am at my job, the street or any other public space and I never gamble when I am bored either.

comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on January 13, 2023, 04:37:40 PM3) Working on a ProjectWhen I am working on significant assignments or have a deadline to meet, I try to avoid going to online casinos because I know I can get carried away. And if I lose money, I might have a horrible day, which would affect my efficiency, productivity and output.Do you have a best time when you visit an online casino and when you totally steer clear from them?Overall, what you have to say represents my voice and perhaps that of many members of our community.To be honest, I have never defined the best time to play online casino or the time to avoid it. however, not infrequently the situation that occurs can be the opposite and what our mood is. in fact, often when we are having problems for example, family, work, or so on, we tend to look for other diversions and one of them is visiting online casinos to vent the problems we are experiencing. or maybe vice versa, when we have free time, I often spend time with my family and avoid visiting online casinos. for bonus points/promotions, extra money, we totally agree.But the only thing out of all the points you included is only point 3 which makes me completely avoid online casinos. (3)work/project. I always avoid visiting online casinos, as long as I'm in a work environment. for me, work is the most important thing and I must have responsibility with my work. after finishing, maybe I can channel my hobbies and visit online casinos. maybe, that's the best time for me.

comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on January 13, 2023, 04:37:40 PMDo you have a best time when you visit an online casino and when you totally steer clear from them?My times/days to play at online casinos are quite varied.The criteria I choose are usually before and during the matches of my favorite teams and championships, which is when I place my bets.Other than that, I "dedicate" two or three days a week to sporadic betting on roulette, dice or card games, but nothing that requires a lot of money.I'm a person who likes to gamble, but I dedicate little time and money to it (fortunately), as a result, I end up losing good deals but I don't regret it.I'd rather miss out on promotions than end up spending more time than I "need" to gamble.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: One of my best times visiting game shops is during a football march. Most of these casinos have a television that shows some of the matches live. There would always be a lot of analysis, criticism, and support. I really enjoy the casino atmosphere during this march days, that's why I like gambling at that time. I also like playing games when I am in the company of friends that are gamblers. As we are gambling, we also discuss some other personal issues, which make the whole thing very interesting. My worst time to gamble is when I am having health challenge. I would stay away totally for casinos if I am not feeling too well. Anxiety and fear could make the sickness worst that why I always abstain from gambling to avoid more medical issues.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Usually the best time for me to gamble is when I feel like to, simply as that. Of course you need to have the capital in the first place before you can enjoy gambling. I do agree with the reasons not to, at least I'm also that person who wants to deal with my problem first before going to gamble. So if I have personal or financial issues at hand, then I will settle that first, otherwise you can gamble with peace of mind and might not enjoy it. Free time? sometimes I just want to take a rest and not to gamble even if I have free time. It must be a perfect combination of feeling right or lucky + money to start my gambling.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: I do not have a set time or period when I do some online gambling, I can decide to gamble anytime, the only thing is that I have different casino games I play, for every mood, depending on my mood, I can choose to play keno, dice plinko and some other in-house games.Gambling doesn't always have to be done only when one is happy, like for example, there are some days where by I gamble just to relieve myself some stress or to calm my nerves if I am angry, but one fact we all should know is that not all types of games are to be played when emotionally down, the gambler can play the game he or she naturally likes, as long as loosing won't be a problem.
